s.text: Whether you have booked in advance or not, try to arrive at the plaza de toros with an hour to spare, enough time to watch the crowd and feel the tension rising.
Whether you have booked in advance or not, try to arrive at the plaza de toros with an hour to spare, enough time to watch the crowd and feel the tension rising.
However you may feel about this controversial sport, it remains very much a part of Spanish life,
